name: g-SWITCH
description:
A Game that has a new concept of changing gravity, and unexpected challenges. Made in Unity's default Render pipeline. The game is set to look good and perform well in a  PC. This game is based on the theme," It's not supposed to do that".

g-SWITCH was made in a total of 48 hours for the IGDC Game Jam conducted from 26 Aug 2022 till 28 Aug 2022.

Contributors
